verses.verse: <S%H8104>Observe<s%> the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%>, and <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

You shall therefore <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his name <S%H8034>there<s%>.

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> with <S%H7651>it<s%>; seven <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> with <S%H3899>it<s%>, even the bread of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>; for you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in <S%H2649>hurry<s%>: that you may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%>.

And there shall be no leavened <S%H7603>bread<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you in all your <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; neither shall there any thing of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, which you <S%H2076>sacrificedst<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, <S%H3885>remain<s%> all night until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
You <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> inside <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you<s%>:

But at the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2076>in<s%>, there you shall sacrifice the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, at the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, at the <S%H4150>season<s%> that you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And you shall <S%H1310>roast<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>: and you shall <S%H6437>turn<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>: and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no work in <S%H4399>it<s%>.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> shall you <S%H5608>number<s%> unto <S%H2490>you<s%>: begin to <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> from such time as you <S%H2490>beginnest<s%> to put the <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to the <S%H7054>corn<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H4530>tribute<s%> of a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the Lord your <S%H3068>God<s%>, according as the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> has blessed <S%H1288>you<s%>:

And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H1121>you<s%>, and your son, and your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and your <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, and your <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, that are <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H4725>you<s%>, in the place which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his name <S%H8034>there<s%>.
And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.

You shall <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, after that you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in your <S%H1637>corn<s%> and your <S%H3342>wine<s%>:

And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H2282>feast<s%>, <S%H1121>you<s%>, and your son, and your <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and your <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, and your <S%H519>maidservant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, that are inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you keep a solemn <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>: because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all your <S%H8393>increase<s%>, and in all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>, therefore you shall surely <S%H8056>rejoice<s%>.

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> shall all your <S%H2138>males<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%>; in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%>, and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>: and they shall not <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7387>empty<s%>:
Every <S%H376>man<s%> shall give as he is <S%H4979>able<s%>, according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which he has given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

<S%H8199>Judges<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall you <S%H5414>make<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7626>you<s%>, throughout your tribes: and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

You shall not <S%H5186>bend<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; you shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%>, neither <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>gift<s%>: for a <S%H7810>gift<s%> does <S%H5786>blind<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and <S%H5557>pervert<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.

That which is <S%H6664>altogether<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> shall you <S%H7291>follow<s%>, that you may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you<s%>.

You shall not <S%H5193>plant<s%> you a <S%H842>grove<s%> of any <S%H6086>trees<s%> near <S%H681>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which you shall make <S%H6213>you<s%>.
Neither shall you set you <S%H6965>up<s%> any <S%H4676>image<s%>; which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%>.
